forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sky presents a bright and inviting canvas, mostly sunny with just a hint of afternoon coolness drifting through. The sun, a warm companion, bathes the streets in a gentle glow while temperatures subtly transition from a comfortable 62 to a soft 59. The breezy whispers of the west northwest wind contribute a refreshing touch, ideal for those meandering through the city's neighborhoods.

As evening descends, clouds will weave themselves into the sky, offering a partly cloudy retreat, with the temperatures dropping to a cool 47. The light west southwest wind continues to offer a relaxed atmosphere perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or through Golden Gate Park. Dressing in layers will prove wise; a light jacket will suffice as the warmth of the day gives way to a crisp evening air. Embrace the tranquil vibe of the day—sip coffee at a café, explore local galleries, or perhaps indulge in the simple pleasure of a book in a sun-drenched park. The city beckons with its usual charm, urging you to savor every moment as the light fades into night.
